page.title: 12RECREATION
page.content: There are many places in Thurnscoe for recreation. These are Hickleton Main Miners Welfare Ground,{Swimming Pool and there are a few other facilities. The{Hickleton Main Miners Welfare {Ground}is a place where you can go to watch or play Cricket, Football or Athletics. The Cricket Club that plays here is the Hickleton Main Cricket Club. The Cricket Club has three teams A, B and the Junior team. The Cricket Club was formed in 1893. There is also a Hickleton Main Football Club. This team has changed its name and ground twice. The club was formed at the turn of the century. There is also a bowling green, it costs 25p to play. The swimming pool was built in 1928 this costs 20p. All these facilities were provided by the Miners Welfare Organisation.
